seniority_level.evidence: 6+ years overall experience with 4+ years in Python/Spark, combined with Data Engineer title indicates senior level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Data Platforms' with core focus on Python, Spark, and PySpark for data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on Spark/PySpark for data processing without streaming technologies mentioned, indicating batch ETL focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring responsibilities, or direct reports - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, GCP, and Azure all mentioned equally as 'good to have' with no clear primary preference indicated

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three cloud providers mentioned equally without clear primary/secondary distinction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Spark/PySpark mentioned as core skills with no streaming technologies (Kafka, Flink) mentioned, indicating batch processing focus

orchestrator_category.evidence: Spark/PySpark mentioned as primary technology with no external orchestrators (Airflow, dbt) mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies mentioned in the job posting

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model with specific location requirement for Mumbai Metropolitan Region

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Mumbai Metropolitan Region, indicating India-specific role

relocation_required.evidence: Role requires presence in Mumbai Metropolitan Region but no relocation package or requirement mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is based in India, making H1B sponsorship not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and role is located in India, not US

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, suggesting work authorization for India is the only requirement

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent employment type indicates W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'limitless career path' in company description but no specific career tracks or advancement paths detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Generic 'career path' mention without specific promotion or advancement opportunities detailed

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-haves (Python, Spark, PySpark) and nice-to-haves (cloud technologies) with balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically for Data Engineer role with well-defined responsibilities and technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 6+ years experience requirement for senior level is reasonable, and skills mentioned (Python, Spark, cloud) are appropriate for data engineer role
